text: The men's 110 metres hurdles at the 2018 European Athletics Championships took place at the Olympic Stadium on 9 and 10 August. ==Records== {| class="wikitable" |- !colspan="5"|Standing records prior to the 2018 European Athletics Championships |- |World record | |12.80 |Brussels, Belgium |7 September 2012 |- |European record | |12.91 |Stuttgart, Germany |20 August 1993 |- |Championship record | |13.02 |Budapest, Hungary |22 August 1998 |- |World Leading | |12.92 |Székesfehérvár, Hungary |2 July 2018 |- |European Leading | |12.92 |Székesfehérvár, Hungary |2 July 2018 |} ==Schedule== {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time !
